name: plug.dj - Transparent UI
description:
Transparency options for the user interface of plug.dj, with exceptions. See notes.

This style is purely cosmetic; There is no reason to use this style other than to apply alpha to to the user interface, to later replace the background with an image of your choosing.
obsoletion_message: plug.dj is now a Rowl-owned asset, and has returned to business.
additional_info: Information Also see these other styles; Transparent buttons and menus Transparent playlist and user menus Transparent dashboard and store Transparent dialog boxes Transparent miscellany The update is here! And it pairs nicely with this! This is a style I made to provide people with the option to have a background image of their choosing appear behind the immediate UI, with the follow exceptions; - Grab menu - DJ button - Vote buttons - Settings menus Except for those, black of varying opaqueness is used across the affected UI items. The unaffected items may or may not be covered in another style,or as an update to this. But at the moment there is a more pressing matter at hand; See Bugs. This latest update modifies the transparent plug.dj to be more simplistic than in previous iterations, presenting a clean, smooth interface that you can see through and use custom backgrounds with. Updates 07/14/14.1 Added padding settings for the chat box because the alternating rows looked a bit weird without it. 07/14/14.2 Modified .welcome to be #chat-messages .welcome to prevent other parts of the UI from being affected negatively 07/14/14.3 Appended .user with IDs for waitlist and userlist, and appended .welcome with ID for chat messages so those are the only affected items. 07/14/14 I did not anticipate .skip affecting .action.skip, so anything involving .skip is now limited to #chat-messages. 07/18/14.1 Appended a readability fix involving text shadow into this next update because someone told me the chat was unreadable before. This should fix the issue. Also added some more text color settings. 07/18/14.2 Added specific input box settings and button items to remove modifications done to the Communities slide-out panel accessible within the Plug menu. 07/19/14 Changed a class to fix one of the input fields, and added another field for text-shadow to affect. mistakes made are now resolved. 07/22/14 User Qeb was very helpful in giving me the original code to restore. Thank goodness some people don't update their stuff. This update excludes the user panel fix from earlier because it's not needed anymore. Hopefully this is the last update to it. 07/22/14 Text shadow fixing because it gets cut off in some places. 12/03/14.1 I figured now is as good a time as ever to update. Suggestion menus are new additions to this update, as well, a simplified style that doesn't go crazy with nth-child and whatever other modifications are necessary to make it work with the new plug.dj. 12/03/14.2 I moved some code into Transparent buttons and menus because some people might not like the transparent menu elements being in this style. 12/04/14 Miscellaneous small fixes 12/05/14.1 Text colour changes 12/05/14.2 Header simplification due to plugcubed pushing the room bar. 12/05/14.3 Padding fixes for people using floating scrollbars. 12/05/14.4 Padding fixes for text shadows. 12/06/14 Removed text shadow from notifications, darkened new friends header 12/07/14 Added chat input border and evened out transparent notifications. 12/08/14 Added dashboard-specific properties to make the friend list and event calendar look somewhat good with the new transparent appearance. 12/11/14 Added padding to waitlist; Don't know how it went off missing. Nonetheless it fills out the list for people using floating scrollbars. 12/12/14 Scrollbar fixes! Now the plug.dj default scrollbar works perfectly. 12/15/14.1 This update is made to improve synergy with Transparent buttons and user menus and Transparent miscellany. 12/15/14.2 Removed notifications border 12/15/14.3 Reverted changes to footer 12/17/14.1 Added new code that pertained to this style, to accommodate for the recent interface update. 12/17/14.2 System message update 12/25/14 Holiday update! Includes Radiant Community Script. 12/30/14 Last update of the year! Forgot that DJ is no longer considered "Staff". Or maybe it had been this way all this time, who knows? Also, added stuff for a new class in plug.dj chat. 03/06/15 The plug.dj UI had a major overhaul recently, but it didn't honestly change that much. I added a border to the current avatar in use (despite the fact status had been removed), appended onto available background colours and even added transparent colours for the shop button. 03/18/15 Added more RCS stuff. 04/10/15 Added subscriber mentions. 06/20/15 This style was sure starting to show its age. Aspects of it have been modified to account for the new UI additions that are now a part of plug.dj. Bugs - Not enough background images for plug.dj that span the width of the entire website - Modifications that were required to resolve from overlap at the footer causes the scrollbar to appear out of frame of the object at the dashboard. Because of how specific this condition is, resolution for this issue will be a low priority. Resolved
